alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Charlotte and Lee Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Lovers Key State Park to 6 miles east of Bonita Springs. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Pineland and Buckingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
